name: mega-bracelet
effect: Allows the player’s Pokémon to Mega Evolve.
short_effect: Allows the player’s Pokémon to Mega Evolve.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This cuff contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This cuff contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This cuff contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
